Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Apolipoprotein A-II (Antimicrobial peptide BAMP-1; mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the apolipoprotein A2 family
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: May stabilize HDL (high density lipoprotein) structure by its association with lipids, and affect the HDL metabolism. Has antimicrobial activity.

Literature.Title: Purification, primary structure, and antimicrobial activities of bovine apolipoprotein A-II.
Literature.Author: Motizuki M, Itoh T, Yamada M, Shimamura S, Tsurugi K.
